name: Flipp
description:
THIS GAME IS VERY MUCH A WORK IN PROGRESS!

I worked on this game Fall 2016 with classmate Jerardo Perez and our stunning composer Jose Carlos Campos Alejos. All of the art, most of the code, and some of the design needs to be redone. I plan to rerelease this game on June 15th with significant updates based on skills I've gained in the past semester.
